title: 7.1 Patch Error, impossible to fix for me (Unspecified error occurred.)
body:
So i had some Frame drops in league, made article about that but before they answered i unistalled league like 2 times maybe even more, and install new Windows, and whenever i try to patch league i get this error : Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
I tried every solution i could find on internet and nothing worked, sometimes it comes to 33%, once it came to 40% and then error happened sometimes it happens when i start my launcher, so riot please, if u can help me with this one because i dont know what else to do, i tried with hextech tool, and like every troubleshoot discusion u have and nothing i still can't patch it.
Sorry for my bad English it is not my first language.

replies.body: After 33%, your patch is done preparing your game files for an update and needs to connect to our patching servers to download them.  Getting this error after 33% suggests that your connection is getting cut off and failing to grab those updates.  use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and help make sure you're not losing comms.  Let me know if you have any questions!
